audio_sermons.title: Evangelists Responsibility to Local Church
audio_sermons.description: Tony Miano preached this sermon at the 2011 Jersey Fire conference. It is both a warning and a call to Christians nomads to return to the protective umbrella of the local church.

audio_sermons.title: Propitiation
audio_sermons.description: This is a clear, pleading sermon with tears and brokenness over the precious doctrine of propitiation. This biblical message clearly portrays the gospel to a generation that is not used to or desiring to hear the hard plain truth.
